normalised: Tech, konnen tori mukhel Bharoti festanche tarikhe vixim vicharlem. Thodem kitin'na aslolem asa, kiteak mhonnlear zaite pavtti tem chandrache calenderacher adharit asta, haina? Mhonnun Gregorian tarikho dor vorsak bodlotat. Mhaka dislem hanv kaim vhoddlea festanchi tun'tuch vollokh kortolom mhonn.

Diwali, uzvaddacho fest, sadharanponn Oktubrant vo Novembrant poddta. Hya vorsa, don hojar ani chovis, tem Oktubarache ek tisrek poddotolem mhonn addklam. Punn eka sarke Hindu calendaracher lagimchea velar pollyat, ya? Sarko vel thoddo bodlu yeta ponchagamacher depend zaun.

Holi, rongacho fest, sadharanponn Marchant asta. Fattlea vorsa, don hojar ani teis, tem Marchache attevek aslem. Hya vorsa, don hojar ani chovis, tem Marchache ponchvisek poddlem. Sodeak jivall ani gon'dolit - tumkam zoxem zai toxem! Tumchea Holi partichi yojna poilech korun dovrat, lokanno.

Navratri, nove ratrik cholta (dislearuch!), vorsa don pavtti manaitalem - Chaitra Navratri March vo Aprilant, ani Sharad Navratri September vo Octoberant. Durga Puja sadharanponn Sharad Navratrik mellaita. Durga Puja hya vorsa (don hojar ani chovis) Octoberache tisrek suru zalem Maha Shashtin.

Eid, khoro dekhlear, Islami chandrache calendarak follow korta, mhonnun tanchi tarikh dor vorsa ekaderak egar disani badolta. Eid-ul-Fitr, Ramadan sumarop korun, Aprilache ekvisek aslem, don hojar ani teis. Eid-ul-Adha (Bakrid) Juneache ponch visek aslem, don hojar ani teis. Don hojar ani chovis khatir, tem addklam Aprilache datek ani Juneache satravek, sarkech. Ani ek pavtti, Islami calendar sampurnn tarikhe khatir vel lagim yetoch consult korat.

Raksha Bandhan, bhav ani bhoinnichem natem, sadharanponn Augustant asta. Don hojar ani teisant, tem Augustache tisevek ani ek tisrek aslem. Don hojar ani chovis khatir, Augustache un'nisek addki ravat. Sarkem "shubh muhurat" Rakhi bandpak pollyat!
Ani nimannem, Christmas dor pavtti Decemberache ponchvisek asta, chandrache calendarachem komplikeshon nam thuim! Ponchvis December dor vorsa. Wink.

Ugddas dovrat heo addach addchi tarikha, khas korun fest chandrache calendarak bandhun asat mhonn. Dor pavtti dharmik calendarancher vo panditancher definitive tarikhen khatri korat. Hanvem axetam hanven tumkam tumchea festanchi yojna korpak adhar kelo mhonn! Haxich festancho anand ghyat!
